Specimen Type(s): Surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sectra Digital Pathology Module (3.3) software for viewing and management of digital images of FFPE surgical pathology slides
Indications for Use Summary: Aid to pathologists for viewing and interpretation of digital images of scanned FFPE surgical pathology slides for primary diagnosis, using Leica Aperio GT 450 DX scanner and Dell U3223QE display; not for frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
